definition: (phonetic character used in transliteration of foreign names)/Taiwan pr. [li4]/variant of 璃[li2]

sentences.english: Objective To observe children ocular injury vitrectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价儿童眼外伤玻璃体切除术。

sentences.english: Of 3 patients who underwent aspirate corporis vitre hyponome combined with anterior chamber plasty. 3 eyes had failed.
sentences.chinese: 其中3例行抽吸玻璃体水囊联合前房形成术失败。

sentences.english: There was a linear relationship between the effectiveness and the degree of PVR.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃体手术的疗效与PVR级别呈线性关系。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo determine the cellular components of vitreous membranes and epiretinal membranes from eyes with proliferative vitreoretinopathy (PVR).
sentences.chinese: 目的鉴定人玻璃体膜及视网膜前膜的细胞成分。

sentences.english: Apoptosis of inflammatory cells in the anterior chamber and of keratocytes in the cornea was seen at day 1.
sentences.chinese: 第2天在玻璃体出现一定数量的凋亡炎症细胞。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the cause of intraocular pressure elevation after vitreoretinal surgery(VRS).
sentences.chinese: 目的研究玻璃体视网膜手术术后高眼压的原因。

sentences.english: This is contained in the vitreous.
The complications were less than for IOL implants in the first stage after vitrectomy.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃体切割术后一期植入者并发症较少。

sentences.english: Vitreous body metabolism is slow, haemorrhage draws displeasure.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃体新陈代谢慢，出血吸收不快。

sentences.english: Objective To study the application of vitrectomy for scleral rupture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨玻璃体切除技术在巩膜破裂伤中的应用。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical charactoristic of suppurative endophthalmitis, evaluate the clinical value of vitrectomy for suppurative endophthalmitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨玻璃体切除术治疗化脓性眼内炎的临床价值。

sentences.english: Similar mechanical and degenerative changes occur in the vitreous.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃体同样发生机械性和退行性变化。

sentences.english: To review the outcomes of ocular trauma treated with pars plana vitrectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析总结玻璃体切除术治疗眼后段外伤的效果。

sentences.english: Luster is vitreous to pearly especially on cleavage surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 光泽是玻璃体，以珠光，特别是对卵裂表面。

sentences.english: Stage 1A: Foeal dehiscence, yellow spot, posterior hyaloids attached to ILM.
sentences.chinese: 中心凹脱离，可见黄点，后玻璃体与内界膜附着。

sentences.english: Local vitreoretinal adhesion and retinal tears were revealed.
sentences.chinese: 局部有玻璃体视网膜粘连和视网膜撕裂。

definition: ciliary body (in the eye, containing the focusing muscles)
choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
optic disk (terminal of the optic nerve on the retina)
anterior chamber (the front chamber of the eye)
optic disk (terminal of the optic nerve on the retina)
